title: Rapid and robust isolation of microglia and vascular cells from brain subregions for integrative single-cell analyses
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Efthalia Preka, Alejandro Lastra Romero, Ying Sun, Yara Onetti Vilalta, Thea Seitz, Adamantia Fragkopoulou, Christer Betsholtz, Ahmed M. Osman, Klas Blomgren
